Hi! I’m Zeke Wattles. My passion is diving deep into emerging and existing technologies to create the best experiences possible. My mission is to humanize technology through creative, unexpected — though thoroughly researched — applications, to find their true communicative potential. As a graduate of ArtCenter College of Design, I have strong foundations in typography and graphic design and I’m largely self taught as a coder and creative technologist. I would love to talk with you!
